name: 2020 (Xim32)
description:
2020 is a top-down shooter game in which your main goal is to stop a virus from spreading. To win this game you need to kill the viruses by shooting at them. You can also use your vaccines to cure people to get a chance at getting a new weapon. Watch out, don't try to use your vaccines on the viruses. That'd multiply them! But those vaccines may work against the mad scientist!

Artists: Andrés Londoño & Jhonatan Garzón

Programmers: Jorge Hernández & Juan Londoño
